title: Problem with the battle boss blitzcrank slash art.
body:
Because of his positioning in the picture, the artwork needed to be flipped, this makes his claw on the wrong side, but there not much that can be done about that. 
but what is really wrong and can be fixed is that the VS part at the bottom hasn't been flipped so blitzcrank is now on the arcade side with MF sona hecarim and riven, instead of on the side with Veigar and blitzcrank.

replies.body: Why isnt veigar and hecarim in the arcade pic?

Instead of flipping, I would much prefer they have 2 versions of the same pic, 1 for each perspective if you catch my meaning.

But I doubt they would do that though.
Maybe it is to show Blitz vs the other arcade skins, since Riven is cut off.
its because rito is too damn lazy to redrawn the bottom part, if they flipped that part it would be sv not vs
They flipped it to make it fit better for the champion page, Riven's page has it the right way around.
i know, but they should flip the bit at the bottom too
